name: Buck Bantam BLW Knife
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: A rugged pocket knife that loves the outdoors almost as much as you do.Strong and versatile spearpoint blade.420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.Lock-back design is reliable and strong.Ergonomic handle and multipoint jimping provides a secure and comfortable grip.Large lanyard hole.Tip-down pocket clip on the right side.
